token.title: Access Token
token.description: Access tokens are used to retrieve data from the API

dialog.descriptionBeforeGenerate: Access tokens are confidential credentials used to retrieve data from the API. Please carefully consider your needs before generating a token, as proper management is essential.
dialog.descriptionAfterGenerate: Your access token has been generated. This is confidential information used to access the API. Please ensure proper security measures are in place to protect this token.

deleteAlert.title: Delete Access Token
deleteAlert.description: Are you sure you want to delete this access token? This action cannot be undone, and any applications using this token will lose access immediately.
